 * Many tuners have one or more bands of tuning - that being NTSC (analog TV), ATSC (digital TV) and various flavors of CATV (cable TV). Newer CATV systems have been slowly transitioning to digital cable. Nearly all tuner cards will be unable to tune the digital portions of cable lineups.
27.context_after: Assuming the TV is cable ready, it will be able to tune all channels one could expect a tuner card to tune. Older, non-cable ready TV's should be able to tune channels 2 through 13 if connected to a non-digital system via the VHF antenna terminals.
